description:
Section 73 application (minor material amendment) to vary condition 3 (hours of operation) of planning permission ref: P2020/2881/FUL dated 14/12/2020 which granted planning permission for the following: 

Change of use of existing unit from restaurant to flexible use as restaurant and/or bar.

The amendments include the extension of operating hours to 24:00hrs each day. ( increase of An hour over the current restriction/condition in place).
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 14/12/2023.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 14/12/2020 under planning permission ref: P2020/2881/FUL.   Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
